Game Introduction:
Long ago, in the world of the Far East, great nations rose and fell, Generals and Advisors fought and schemed for their own thrones. Now you must compete, your Majesty. Build your army, hire powerful and unique Generals and defeat enemy forces to be the King of all the Kingdoms!
Graphical Features:
The realistic ink painting style of the Military Commanders will make you fall in love with our graphical interface!
Obtain Generals:
Defeat your enemies to collect gems, and recruit all of the heroes of ancient China! Relive the history and the drama of this story as old as time. Warriors, brave and noble, compete for the title and the crown! Will you join?
Strategic Gameplay:
Your Majesty, all you need is your wisdom, the valor of your generals, the viciousness of your soldiers and the strategy of your battle formation to break the enemy and rout those who oppose you!
Special Systems:
Group Dungeons, Daily Prize Wheel, Gold Mines, World Bosses and much more! Delve into our in-depth system and share it with your friends!
Exciting Social Interaction:
Ever get bored with single player games? Want some engagement with other players both as an ally and enemy? Create your Nation, find your Ministers, plan your attack and conquer the world around you! Join in the numerous Arena systems and ways to compete head to head with other players! Win exclusive honors and prizes that are rewarded only to the top competitors. Invite your friends to join and collect the valuable prizes awaiting you!

The Peach Garden Oath, The Battle of Red Cliff, Zhuge Liang's battles with Sima Yi... Ancient China is chaos incarnate. Choose your heroes and join the battles to relive history! Are you ready?
Hurry up and join Hero's Throne! Be one of the few who to beat the odds and become a sage Emperor! Come on!
